headline: Tech Companies Aren’t Hiring. They're Spending on AI.
summary: In the past year, these companies have shed 2,700 jobs, for a decline in employment of 0.1%.  Bucking the trend are software publishers like Microsoft and Oracle, which added 16,100 jobs in the past year.

raw.headline: Tech Companies Aren’t Hiring. They're Spending on AI.
raw.summary: In the past year, these companies have shed 2,700 jobs, for a decline in employment of 0.1%.  Bucking the trend are software publishers like Microsoft and Oracle, which added 16,100 jobs in the past year.

headline: BYOD and Enterprise Mobility Market Growth Opportunities and Competitive Strategies (2025-2034) Featuring Microsoft, Cisco, Blackberry, Infosys, IBM and More
summary: Key market opportunities in the BYOD and enterprise mobility arena include leveraging cloud mobility solutions for enhanced productivity, catering to sectors like healthcare and BFSI with secure data access, and addressing rising remote work trends.
